header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED IN GRAND COMMITTEE

text.quote: 000: Clause 38, page 31, line 1, leave out paragraph (f) and insert—
000: Clause 39, page 31, line 19, at end insert “, and
text.IndentOne: (d) in the case of an institution approved by the Secretary of State under section 41 also obtains its consent”

text.quote: 000: Clause 40, page 32, line 18, at end insert “, and
text.IndentOne: (c) in the case of an institution approved by the Secretary of State under section 41 also obtains its consent”
